title: Allow access to BrowserHttp property of WebRequestCreator class
body: The WebClient type doesn't allow me to use cookies stored by the Web Browser control and I'll have to ask the user for credentials which they've already stored in the form of cookies through the login page of a particular site in the web browser. There is an indirect way of using BrowserHttp but it's kinda buggy. It's not exposed by the SDK, please fix it!
